background_description: The background consists of clear water, showing ripples and reflections at the surface. Blurry dark green aquatic plants or algae are visible behind the fish, set against a soft, muted grey-blue backdrop, likely an aquarium or pond setting.
explanation: Two Koi fish are clearly visible in the image. One is a vibrant orange and white, while the other is a distinct golden color. Their bright coloration and prominent features make them stand out significantly against the darker, blurry aquatic background, confirming the absence of any camouflage.
